subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann included Julian Green, John Brooks and DeAndre Yedlin — three players who did not take part in World Cup qualifying — on his roster for the tournament, keeping an eye on the future.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann included Julian Green, John Brooks and DeAndre Yedlin — three players who did not take part in World Cup qualifying — on his roster for the tournament, keeping an eye on the future.
